titleStmt.title: By the King. To our trusty and welbeloved our colonells, lievtenant-colonells, serjeant-majors, captaines, and all other our officers of our army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: C. R.
At foot of text to Colonells incorrectly reads: "From our court at Oxford, this Twentieth of January, 1642." Date should read: 12 January, 1643. -- Steele.
Includes: Worcester agreement, 10 Jan., to raise £3,000 monthly.
Reproductions of the originals in the Societies of Antiquaries Library, London [Early English Books] and the British Library [Thomason Tr.
